questions.quote: Yeah, I put a six hour tape in. That should cover the experiment, the arrest, and most of your trial. Alright, I'll see ya.
[To Jerry] Oh, remind me to talk to you about something later.
A backup system? We're designing bathroom doors with our legs exposed in anticipation of the locks not working? That's not a system. That's a complete breakdown of the system.
You sure have a lot of friends. How come I never see any of these people?
Well maybe you can stick around after everybody leaves and we can sweep together.
Oh, yes. I already packed up my desk, sir. I can be outta here in an hour.
No. I need a guy that can rig a Frogger machine so that I can move it without losing power, 'cause I have the high score. H-hello?
You should've seen her face. It was the exact same look my father gave me when I told him I wanted to be a ventriloquist.
Forty-nine cents a pound. That's practically half than what you're paying at the supermarket. I don't know why you don't go to Joe's.
Oh, uh, this power. I'm dangerous Jerry, I'm very very dangerous.
